item.title: Weather App Update
item.description: Given Seattle’s recent spat of rain, it’s high time for a weather app update. In my previous post, I recommended Dark Sky over Yahoo! Weather and Solar. Since then, a bunch of new apps have entered the space, some deserving of attention. Dark Sky: a precipitous fall (Dark Sky: $4 in the iOS App Store) I loved the old Dark Sky interface. It was clean and efficient. Unfortunately, they veered off into “playing with fire” levels of UI experimentation.
